description: The BR-01 RTO serves the Patna district, the capital city of Bihar. As the primary transport office for the state capital, it manages a high volume of vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and permits for both private and commercial transport. It is one of the most critical and busiest transport offices in the state of Bihar.
address: DTO Office Patna, Bank Road, West Gandhi Maidan, Raja Ji Salai, Chajju Bagh, Patna, Bihar

description: The BR-02 RTO serves the Gaya district in Bihar, acting as the primary hub for vehicle registration and transport administration in the Magadh region. It oversees the licensing and regulatory compliance for one of India's most significant religious and historical cities.
address: Collectorate Building, Collectorate Circle, Durga Bari, Gaya, Bihar

description: The BR-03 RTO serves the Bhojpur district in Bihar, with its administrative headquarters in Arrah. It is responsible for vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and the enforcement of transport regulations across the district.
address: Collectoriate Building, Arrah, Bhojpur, Bihar

description: The BR-04 RTO serves the Saran district with its headquarters located in Chapra, Bihar. It is a key administrative hub for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and transport tax collection within the Saran division.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Chapra, Saran, Bihar

description: The BR-05 RTO serves the East Champaran district, headquartered in the historic city of Motihari. This office manages all transport-related activities including vehicle registration, permit issuance, and licensing for the district bordering Nepal.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Motihari, East Champaran, Bihar

description: BR-06 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Muzaffarpur, a key administrative and commercial center in North Bihar. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, road tax collection, and the issuance of driving licenses for the entire Muzaffarpur district under the Tirhut division.
address: Collectoriate Building, Muzaffarpur, Bihar

description: BR-07 is the official District Transport Office for Darbhanga, Bihar, which manages vehicle registration, commercial permits, and driving licenses for one of the oldest cities in North Bihar. It serves as a critical transport administrative hub for the Darbhanga Division, ensuring compliance with state transport laws.
address: District Transport Office, Laheriasarai, Darbhanga, Bihar

description: The BR-08 RTO serves the Munger district in Bihar, historically known as Monghyr. It is an active District Transport Office (DTO) responsible for vehicle registrations, issuing driving licenses, and enforcing motor vehicle regulations within the Munger region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Munger, Bihar

description: The District Transport Office (DTO) in Begusarai is the administrative body responsible for vehicle registration and licensing in the Begusarai district under code BR-09. It plays a vital role in regulating transport for this industrial hub, often referred to as the Industrial Capital of Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Begusarai, Bihar

description: The BR-10 Regional Transport Office serves the Bhagalpur district in Bihar, widely known as the 'Silk City'. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the collection of road taxes across the district jurisdiction.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Adampur, Bhagalpur, Bihar

description: The BR-11 RTO serves the Purnia district in Bihar, managing vehicle registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance. It plays a significant role in the transport infrastructure of the Purnia division and the Seemanchal region.
address: District Transport Office, Maranga Road, Mariam Nagar, Purnia, Bihar

description: The BR-19 RTO office serves the Saharsa district in the Kosi division of Bihar, managing all motor vehicle-related administrative tasks. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of road safety regulations across the district. The office plays a critical role in the transportation infrastructure of North Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Police Line, Saharsa, Bihar

description: BR-21 is the District Transport Office for Nalanda, headquartered in the historic city of Bihar Sharif. The office serves as a critical hub for vehicle registration and licensing in a region renowned for its educational heritage and proximity to the ancient Nalanda University. It manages transport regulation across 20 blocks, ensuring compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act within this significant administrative and cultural district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Bihar Sharif, Nalanda, Bihar

description: The BR-22 RTO is the primary transport authority for the Bettiah region in the West Champaran district of Bihar. It handles various transport-related services including vehicle registration, driving licenses, and the collection of road taxes for the district.
address: District Transport Office, Kamalnath Nagar, Bettiah, Bihar

description: The BR-24 RTO serves the Dehri-on-Sone subdivision within the Rohtas district of Bihar. It is responsible for essential transport services including vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and road tax collection for the southern region of the district.
address: District Transport Office, Dehri-on-Sone, Rohtas, Bihar

description: BR-25 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Jehanabad, Bihar. It provides essential services such as vehicle registration, fitness certificates, and driving license management for the Jehanabad district under the Magadh administrative division.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Jehanabad, Bihar

description: The BR-26 RTO serves the Aurangabad district in Bihar, operating under the Magadh Division. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement across the district's administrative blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectoriate Campus, Aurangabad, Bihar

description: The BR-27 RTO is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Nawada, Bihar. It is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and the enforcement of transport regulations within the Nawada district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Nawada, Bihar

description: The BR-28 Regional Transport Office serves the Gopalganj district in Bihar, operating under the Saran Division transport authority. This office is responsible for the registration of private and commercial vehicles, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of road safety regulations across the district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Gopalganj, Bihar

description: The BR-29 RTO serves the Siwan district in Bihar, functioning as the District Transport Office responsible for motor vehicle regulation. It handles driving licenses, vehicle registrations, and the enforcement of transport laws across the district's various sub-divisions.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Siwan, Bihar

description: The BR-30 Regional Transport Office serves the Sitamarhi district in Bihar, headquartered in the administrative hub of Dumra near the Indo-Nepal border. It manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement for the entire district under the Tirhut Division. The office is vital for regulating cross-border transport and local movement in this culturally significant region known as the birthplace of Goddess Sita.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra Road, Behind Court Campus, Dumra, Sitamarhi, Bihar

description: BR-31 is the District Transport Office for Vaishali, headquartered in the strategically vital city of Hajipur, located at the confluence of the Ganges and Gandak rivers. The office manages vehicle registration and licensing for a region that serves as a primary gateway between North Bihar and Patna via the Mahatma Gandhi Setu. As a historical hub known for being the world's oldest republic, the RTO handles significant commercial traffic related to agricultural trade and industrial developments in the Vaishali district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar

description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office for Madhubani, Bihar, situated in the historic Mithila heartland. It oversees essential services including vehicle registration, licensing, and permit issuance for a district known for its cultural heritage and proximity to the Nepal border. The office plays a vital role in maintaining transport regulations and safety across sub-divisions like Jainagar and Jhanjharpur.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Bhoop Narayan Singh Colony, Madhubani, Bihar

description: The Samastipur District Transport Office (BR-33) serves as the primary transport authority for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. This RTO is vital for managing the high volume of traffic in a region known as a major railway junction and a key agricultural hub in North Bihar. The office oversees vehicle registration, driving licenses, and road tax collection for its 20 administrative blocks, ensuring compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar

description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves the Khagaria district in Bihar, uniquely situated at the confluence of several major rivers including the Ganga and Gandak. Operating under the Munger transport division, it oversees vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement for a predominantly agrarian region. This office plays a critical role in facilitating transport connectivity for the seven administrative blocks that make up this riverine district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar

description: The BR-37 Regional Transport Office serves the Kishanganj district in Bihar, located at the strategic 'Chicken's Neck' corridor bordering West Bengal and Nepal. This office manages vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permits for a region that serves as a vital transit link between Mainland India and the North-Eastern states.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Kishanganj, Bihar

description: BR-38 is the official RTO code for the District Transport Office in Araria, Bihar, serving the entire Araria district within the Purnia division. Established in 1990 when Araria became an independent district, it handles vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and road tax collection for this border region near Nepal. The office is a critical transit hub for north-eastern Bihar and manages transportation services for key areas like Forbesganj and Narpatganj.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Kharahiya Basti, Araria, Bihar

description: The BR-39 District Transport Office (DTO) serves the Katihar district in the Purnia division of eastern Bihar, acting as a vital hub for vehicle registration and licensing near the West Bengal border. Operating from the Collectorate Building in the Mirchaibari area, this office manages transport services for one of the region's most significant railway junctions and commercial centers, ensuring compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act across the district's 16 administrative blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Purnea-Katihar Road, Mirchaibari, Katihar, Bihar

description: BR-43 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Madhepura, Bihar, operating under the Kosi administrative division. It is the nodal agency for motor vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and road tax collection across the district's extensive network of urban and rural blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Campus, Madhepura, Bihar

description: BR-44 is the District Transport Office for Buxar, Bihar, providing essential services such as vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permits. Located near the Uttar Pradesh border, this office serves the entire Buxar district, ensuring regulatory compliance for both private and commercial transport across its urban and rural blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Buxar, Bihar

description: The BR-45 RTO functions as the District Transport Office (DTO) for Bhabua, serving the entire Kaimur district in Bihar. It is responsible for the administration of the Motor Vehicles Act, including vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and collection of road taxes for the region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Bhabua, Kaimur, Bihar

description: BR-46 is the District Transport Office (DTO) for Jamui, Bihar, operating under the Munger Division. This office is the primary authority for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and road tax collection across the district's various blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Jamui, Bihar

description: BR-50 is the official RTO code for the Supaul district in Bihar, operating as the District Transport Office (DTO). It handles all vehicle-related services including registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance for the Kosi division region bordering Nepal.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Supaul, Bihar

description: BR-51 is the Regional Transport Office for the Banka district in Bihar. The office is responsible for vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and enforcing transport laws under the Bihar Transport Department. It serves a significant rural and urban population in the southeastern part of the state.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Banka, Bihar

description: BR-52 is the official code for the District Transport Office in Sheikhpura, Bihar, operating under the Munger Transport Division. This office provides critical services such as vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of transport safety regulations for the entire district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Sheikhpura, Bihar

description: BR-53 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Lakhisarai district of Bihar. It facilitates vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and road tax collection for the local jurisdiction.
address: Collectorate Building, Lakhisarai, Bihar

description: The BR-55 RTO serves the Sheohar district in Bihar, providing essential services such as vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and transport permits. It operates under the Tirhut division and caters to one of the smallest districts in the state, ensuring local compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act.
address: District Transport Office, Collectoriate Building, Sheohar, Bihar

description: The BR-56 Regional Transport Office serves the Arwal district in Bihar, which was established as a separate district in 2001. This office manages vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and ensures the enforcement of the Motor Vehicles Act across the district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Arwal, Bihar

description: BR-57 is the Regional Transport Office serving the Sasaram region within the Rohtas district of Bihar. It operates as a vital center for vehicle registration, driving permit issuance, and the collection of road taxes, supplementing the existing BR-24 code for the district.
address: Regional Transport Office (RTO), Geeta Ghat Colony, Sasaram, Bihar
